net.derquinse.common.orm.hib
Class HibernateGenericDAO<T extends Entity<ID>,ID extends Serializable>

java.lang.Object
  net.derquinse.common.orm.hib.AbstractHibernateDAO
      net.derquinse.common.orm.hib.HibernateGenericDAO<T,ID>
All Implemented Interfaces:
DAO, GenericDAO<T,ID>
Direct Known Subclasses:
HibernateEntityDAO
public abstract class HibernateGenericDAO<T extends Entity<ID>,ID extends Serializable>
extends AbstractHibernateDAO
implements GenericDAO<T,ID>

Implementation of the Generic DAO.

Author:
Andres Rodriguez
